item.title: Connecting and using PostgreSQL to a NodeJS app
item.description: Quick intro This is a short blog post on how to connect Postgres to a NodeJS app. This isn’t that hard to do but I figured I might as well write it down as I’m going to be doing this a lot in the future. Postgres quick intro Connecting to Postgres # Switch to the postgres user sudo -iu postgres # Connect to psql psql Psql commands \l - list all databases \dt - list all tables in current database \c database_name - connect to a specific database Executing pg queries from NodeJS First we need to install a npm package called pg.
